message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant $10,000 value to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to serving you.
